page.title: 06School Diamond Jubilee
page.content:
{Sixty years}ago{Findern School}first opened and to celebrate our{Diamond {Jubilee}every class has worked upon a period going up in decades. My class did the 1920's. There were different groups in the class, four people to each group. My group did work about schools. In the end after all our hard work we had a very good display. Our parents came to look around each class and they said it was very nice.
The choir and recorders gave two {concerts}one for the previous pupils and one for the parents. Now I feel sad its all over. I enjoyed the{party a lot and we had games and a magician. A magician is a man who does lots of tricks. The food was delicious and the {disco}was very noisy but excellent.
